report.title: Report for trigger against Mammal Society Atlas Survey
report.description: Lists the most recent recordings for all species in the selected survey.
report.query: SELECT co.sample_id, ttl.taxon, co.date_start, snf.public_entered_sref, co.location_name, o.comment, co.website_id FROM cache_occurrences_functional co JOIN cache_samples_functional s on s.id = co.sample_id AND s.survey_id = co.survey_id AND s.website_id = co.website_id JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id = s.id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON ttl.id = co.taxa_taxon_list_id JOIN occurrences o ON o.id = co.id WHERE co.survey_id = 35 AND co.created_on > '#date#' AND co.record_status NOT IN ('I','T') #order_by#
